name: dashlit
description: Dashlit is a minimalist dashboard for collecting and displaying custom metrics, built for developers and homelab users. It supports widgets, Markdown, and embeds, designed for low-overhead setup and rapid data visualization.
features: Custom Metrics: Display any data you want to track. Flexible visualization.
Widget System: Build dashboards with modular components. Compose your view.
Markdown Support: Add formatted text and documentation. Rich content display.
Embed Support: Include external content and services. Unified dashboard.
Low Overhead: Minimal setup and resource usage. Quick deployment.
Developer Friendly: Built for technical users and homelab enthusiasts. Speaks your language.
